title: Linked Accounts
description: Manage your external bank accounts for payments

emptyState.title: No linked accounts
emptyState.description: Link a bank account to start making payments. You can use ACH, wire transfers, or real-time payments.

loading.title: Error loading linked accounts
loading.default: An unexpected error occurred while loading your linked accounts. Please try again.
loading.400: Your platform does not have permission to access linked accounts. Please contact support.

messages.ACTIVE: This account is verified and ready for transactions.
messages.INACTIVE: This account has been deactivated and cannot be used for transactions.
messages.MICRODEPOSITS_INITIATED: We're sending two small deposits to your account to verify ownership. This typically takes 3-5 business days. Once they arrive, you'll need to verify the amounts.
messages.PENDING: Your account information is being processed. You'll be notified once complete.
messages.READY_FOR_VALIDATION: The verification deposits have arrived in your account. Please verify the amounts within 20 business days to activate your account.
messages.REJECTED: There was an issue linking this account. Please check the account details or contact support.

paymentDisabledTooltip.READY_FOR_VALIDATION: Complete account verification to enable payments
paymentDisabledTooltip.MICRODEPOSITS_INITIATED: Waiting for microdeposit verification to enable payments
paymentDisabledTooltip.INACTIVE: Account is inactive. Please activate to make payments
paymentDisabledTooltip.REJECTED: Account verification was rejected. Please contact support
paymentDisabledTooltip.PENDING: Account is being processed. Please wait to make payments

linkAccount.title: Link A New Account
linkAccount.description: Connect your external bank account to make payments.
linkAccount.descriptionSuccess: Your account has been linked and is ready to use.

certify.label: I authorize verification of my bank account information

validation.required: You must authorize verification to continue

editAccount.title: Edit Linked Account
editAccount.description: Update the bank account information and payment methods.
editAccount.descriptionSuccess: Your linked account has been updated successfully.

removeAccount.title: Remove Account
removeAccount.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from your linked accounts?
removeAccount.descriptionSuccess: {{name}} has been successfully removed from your linked accounts.

microdeposits.title: Verify Account
microdeposits.description: Enter the two small deposit amounts we sent to {{name}} in any order. You have 3 total attempts to enter these amounts.

loading.title: Error loading account information
loading.message: Unable to load the account details. Please try again or contact support.

verificationFailed.title: Verification failed
verificationFailed.default: An error occurred during verification. Please try again.
verificationFailed.400: The microdeposits you have entered were incorrect. Please try again.

maxAttemptsExceeded.title: Max number of attempts exceeded
maxAttemptsExceeded.description: The verification process could not be completed due to multiple incorrect attempts.
maxAttemptsExceeded.message: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts to verify microdeposits. Please contact support.

maxAttemptsExceeded.title: Account Verification Failed
maxAttemptsExceeded.description: Linking {{name}} has failed as verification could not be completed due to multiple incorrect attempts. To use this account, you'll need to link it again to restart the verification process.

verificationSuccess.title: Account Verified Successfully
verificationSuccess.description: Linking {{name}} has been successfully completed and the account is now ready for transactions.
